title: 3D: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: Wolverine is recovering from his injuries when he crosses paths with the loudmouth Deadpool. They team up to defeat a common enemy.
cast: Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman, Morena Baccarin, Matthew MacFadyen, Shiori Kutsuna, Emma Corrin, Brianna Hildebrand, Rob Delaney, Karan Soni, Leslie Uggams, Stefan Kapicic

title: Auron Mein Kahan Dum Tha
description: Showcases a love story that unfolds from 2002 to 2023.
cast: Ajay Devgn, Tabu, Jimmy Sheirgill, Shantanu Maheshwari and Saiee Manjrekar.

title: NUMBARI SUN
description: The First Films with a history related to gold with Love story & Comedy.
cast: Saroj Khanal, Gaurav Pahari, Namrata Sapkota, Buddhi Tamang, Rajaram Poudel, Binod Neupane, Kiran Nepali, Rajendra Khadgi etc.

title: MODIBENI
cast: Barsha Siwakoti, Praveen Khatiwada, Amar Pratap Shrestha, Saroj Khanal, Rejina Uprety, Dilip KC, Sneha Bhattrai, Jeevan Bhattrai.

title: Borderlands
description: Based on the best-selling videogame, this all-star action-adventure follows a ragtag team of misfits on a mission to save a missing girl who holds the key to unimaginable power.
cast: Jamie Lee Curtis, Haley Bennett, Gina Gershon
